price: Ni ho rero Imana Allah Yahamagara Iti: “Ewe Zakariya! Twebwe Allah, ni ukuri Twakwumviye igisabisho cawe, Turaguhaye inkuru nziza y’ihumure ko uzokwibaruka umwana w’umuhungu yitwa Yahya, iryo zina ntitwigeze Turyita umuntu n’umwe aho hambere ngo abe mazina yiwe”.
arabic: يَٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ ٱسۡمُهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ لَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ سَمِيّٗا

meta.transliteration: yāzakariyyā innā nubashiruka bighulāmin us'muhu yaḥyā lam najʿal lahu min qablu samiyyan
